ansible_deployment.DeploymentDirectory¶

class ansible_deployment.DeploymentDirectory(path, roles_src, config_file='deployment.json')¶

Represents an ansible deployment directory.

Parameters

  • path (path) – Path to deployment directory.

  • roles_src (dict) – Dictionary containing roles repo information. The following keys need to be present: repo is a git clonable url. branch is branch name of that repo.

  • config_file (path) – Path to deployment config file.

path¶

Path to deployment directory.

Type

Path

roles_src¶

Roles repo git information.

Type

dict

roles_path¶

Path to deployment roles directory.

Type

Path

config_file¶

Path to deployment config file.

Type

Path

repo¶

Deployment git repository.

Type

git.Repo

unstaged_changes¶

List of unstaged files.

Type

list

staged_changes¶

List of staged files.

Type

list

changes¶

List of all changed files.

Type

list

create()¶

Create deployment directory.

delete()¶

Delete deployment directory.

update(roles, playbook, inventory)¶

Update deployment directory.

The update will pull changes from the roles src repo and will update all deployment files.

The update will NOT commit any changes to the main deployment directory.

update_git(message='Automatic ansible-deployment update.', files=['playbook.yml', 'hosts.yml', 'ansible.cfg', '.gitmodules', 'host_vars', 'group_vars', 'deployment.json'], force_commit=False)¶

Updates the deployment git repository.

Parameters

  • message (str) – Commit message.

  • files (sequence) – Files to commit.

  • force_commit (bool) – Whether or not to force an empty commit.

The update will add the specified files and commit them.
